Scanning electron microscopy.Description: Scanning electron microscopy of delaminated fracture surfaces was implemented to determine the morphology of the nanostructured phases and gain insight into the mechanisms behind the observed mechanical reinforcement.

Dielectric and impedance spectroscopy an.Description: Transverse electrical conductivity was determined using alternating current impedance spectroscopy on polished specimens.

Dynamic mechanical analysis.Description: Dynamic mechanical thermal analysis (DMTA) was performed on unidirectional composite specimens using an RSA3 (TA Instruments) in three-point bending with a 40-mm span. Temperature ramps were carried out from 30°C to 320°C at a heating rate of 3°Cmin−1 with 0.1% strain amplitude and 1Hz frequency.
